io.klerch.alexa.utterances.util

Class Resolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.klerch.alexa.utterances.util.Resolver

  • public class Resolver
extends Object
    Resolver provides a bunch of methods used by Generator to resolve artifacts in grammar specification

    • Field Detail

      • invocationDefintion

        public static final Pattern invocationDefintion
        Regex pattern to extract invocation name specification (e.g. Invocation: my skill invocation name)

      • intentDefinition

        public static final Pattern intentDefinition
        Regex pattern to extract intent specification (e.g. MyIntent: sample utterance)

      • slotTypeDefinition

        public static final Pattern slotTypeDefinition
        Regex pattern to extract slot type definition (e.g. {MySlotType}: value, value1, value2)

      • slotInUtteranceDefinition

        public static final Pattern slotInUtteranceDefinition
        Regex pattern to extract slot placeholder in a sample utterance (e.g. my {{slot:type}})

      • placeholderInUtteranceExcludingResolved

        public static final Pattern placeholderInUtteranceExcludingResolved
        Regex pattern to extract remaining placeholders not already substituted with an internal reference during an interim step of the generation process (e.g. {placeholder} but not {!hashcode})

      • resolvedPlaceholders

        public static final Pattern resolvedPlaceholders
        Regex pattern to extract placeholders that were substituted with an internal reference during an interim step of the generation process (e.g. {!hashcode})

        public Resolver()

    • Method Detail

      • resolveInvocationDefinition

        public static Optional<org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.ImmutablePair<String,String>> resolveInvocationDefinition(String line)
        Extracts invocation name specification (e.g. Invocation: my skill invocation name)
        Parameters:
        line - sample
        Returns:
        if sample represents an invocation name specification it returns the extracted key and value (invocation name)

      • resolveIntentDefinition

        public static Optional<org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.ImmutablePair<String,String>> resolveIntentDefinition(String line)
        Extracts intent specification (e.g. MyIntent: sample utterance)
        Parameters:
        line - sample
        Returns:
        if sample represents an intent specification it returns the extracted key (intent name) and value (first sample utterance)

      • resolveSlotTypeDefinition

        public static Optional<org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.ImmutablePair<String,String>> resolveSlotTypeDefinition(String line)
        Extracts slot type definition (e.g. {MySlotType}: value, value1, value2)
        Parameters:
        line - sample
        Returns:
        if sample represents a slot type specification it returns the extracted key (slot type name) and value (first line of slot values)

      • resolveSlotValues

        public static List<String> resolveSlotValues(List<String> values)
        Resolves a list of slot values by normalizing format and splitting up multiple values in one line to multiple values
        Parameters:
        values - list of samples with value specifications
        Returns:
        list of values in the format of key:value

      • resolveToUniqueSlotName

        public static String resolveToUniqueSlotName(List<Slot> existingSlots,
                                             String slotName)
        Given a set of already existing slot names within an utterance and another slot name this method takes care of returning a unique slot name not duplicating a name of the existing ones
        Parameters:
        existingSlots - list of existing slot names within a sample utterance
        slotName - next slot name within the sample utterance
        Returns:
        unique name for slotName

      • resolveSlotType

        public static SlotType resolveSlotType(String slotTypeName,
                                       List<String> values)
        Given a slot type name and a list of values in the format of key:value this method creates a new SlotType object with slot id, slot value and synonyms
        Parameters:
        slotTypeName - name for the slot type
        values - list of values for the slot type
        Returns:
        slot type object
